verses.verse: Let <WG2233> as many<WG3745> as<WG3745> are<WG1526> servants<WG1401> under<WG5259> the yoke<WG2218> count<WG2233> their own<WG2398> masters<WG1203> worthy<WG514> of all<WG3956> honor<WG5092>, that<WG2443> the name<WG3686> of God<WG2316> and<WG2532> the doctrine<WG1319> be<WG987> not<WG3361> blasphemed<WG987>.

And <WG1161> they that have<WG2192> believing<WG4103> masters<WG1203>, let them<WG2706> not<WG3361> despise<WG2706> them<WG3754>, because they are<WG1526> brethren<WG80>; but<WG235> let<WG1398> them serve<WG1398> them the rather<WG3123>, because<WG3754> they that partake<WG482> of the benefit<WG2108> are<WG1526> believing<WG4103> and<WG2532> beloved<WG27>. These things<WG5023> teach<WG1321> and<WG2532> exhort<WG3870>.

If <WG1487> any man<WG5100> teacheth a different<WG2085> doctrine<WG2532>, and consenteth<WG4334> not<WG3361> to sound<WG5198> words<WG3056>, even the<WG3588> words of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, and<WG2532> to the doctrine<WG1319> which is according to<WG2596> godliness<WG2150>;

he is puffed<WG5187> up<WG1987>, knowing nothing<WG3367>, but<WG235> doting<WG3552> about<WG4012> questionings<WG2214> and<WG2532> disputes of words<WG3055>, whereof3739, 1537 cometh<WG1096> envy<WG5355>, strife<WG2054>, railings<WG988>, evil<WG4190> surmisings<WG5283>,
wranglings <WG3859> of men<WG444> corrupted<WG1311> in mind<WG3563> and<WG2532> bereft<WG650> of the truth<WG225>, supposing that<WG3543> godliness<WG2150> is<WG1511> a way of gain<WG4200>.
But <WG1161> godliness<WG2150> with<WG3326> contentment<WG841> is<WG2076> great<WG3173> gain<WG4200>:
for <WG1063> we brought<WG1533> nothing<WG3762> into<WG1519> the world<WG2889>, for neither<WG1212> can<WG1410> we carry1627, 3761 anything<WG5100> out<WG1627>;
but <WG1161> having<WG2192> food<WG1305> and<WG2532> covering<WG4629> we shall be<WG714> therewith<WG5125> content<WG714>.

But <WG1161> they that are minded<WG1014> to be rich<WG4147> fall<WG1706> into<WG1519> a temptation<WG3986> and<WG2532> a snare<WG3803> and<WG2532> many<WG4183> foolish<WG453> and<WG2532> hurtful<WG983> lusts<WG1939>, such as<WG3748> drown<WG1036> men<WG444> in<WG1519> destruction<WG3639> and<WG2532> perdition<WG684>.

For <WG1063> the love of money<WG5365> is<WG2076> a root<WG4491> of all<WG3956> kinds of evil<WG2556>: which3739, 3713 some<WG5100> reaching after<WG3713> have been led astray<WG635> from<WG575> the faith<WG4102>, and<WG2532> have pierced<WG4044> themselves<WG1438> through<WG4044> with many<WG4183> sorrows<WG3601>.

But <WG1161> thou<WG4771>, O<WG5599> man<WG444> of God<WG2316>, flee<WG5343> these things<WG5023>; and<WG1161> follow after<WG1377> righteousness<WG1343>, godliness<WG2150>, faith<WG4102>, love<WG26>, patience<WG5281>, meekness<WG4236>.

Fight <WG75> the good<WG2570> fight<WG73> of the faith<WG4102>, lay hold on<WG1949> the life<WG2222> eternal<WG166>, whereunto1519, 1519 thou wast2564, 2532 called<WG2564>, and<WG2532> didst confess<WG3670> the good<WG2570> confession<WG3671> in the sight<WG1799> of many<WG4183> witnesses<WG3144>.

I <WG3853> charge<WG3853> thee<WG4671> in the sight of<WG1799> God<WG2316>, who giveth life<WG2227> to all things<WG3956>, and<WG2532> of Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>, who<WG3140> before<WG1909> Pontius<WG4194> Pilate<WG4091> witnessed<WG3140> the good<WG2570> confession<WG3671>;

that <WG5083> thou<WG4571> keep<WG5083> the commandment<WG1785>, without spot<WG784>, without reproach<WG423>, until<WG3360> the appearing<WG2015> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>:

which <WG3739> in its<WG2398> own times<WG2540> he shall show<WG1166>, who is the blessed<WG3107> and<WG2532> only<WG3441> Potentate<WG1413>, the King<WG935> of kings<WG936>, and<WG2532> Lord<WG2962> of lords<WG2961>;

who <WG2192> only<WG3441> hath<WG2192> immortality<WG110>, dwelling in<WG3611> light<WG5457> unapproachable<WG3739>; whom no<WG3762> man<WG444> hath seen<WG1492>, nor<WG3761> can<WG1410> see<WG1492>: to<WG676> whom<WG3739> be honor<WG5092> and<WG2532> power<WG2904> eternal<WG166>. Amen<WG281>.

Charge <WG3853> them that are rich<WG4145> in<WG1722> this<WG3568> present world<WG165>, that they be<WG5309> not<WG3361> highminded<WG5309>, nor<WG3366> have their hope<WG1679> set on<WG1909> the uncertainty<WG83> of riches<WG4149>, but<WG235> on1722, 2198 God<WG2316>, who giveth<WG3930> us<WG2254> richly<WG4146> all things<WG3956> to<WG1519> enjoy<WG619>;
that they do good<WG14>, that they be rich<WG4147> in<WG1722> good<WG2570> works<WG2041>, that they be ready to distribute<WG2130>, willing to communicate<WG2843>;

laying up in store<WG597> for themselves<WG1438> a good<WG2570> foundation<WG2310> against<WG1519> the time to come<WG3195>, that<WG2443> they may lay hold on<WG1949> the life<WG2222> which is life indeed<WG2222>.

O <WG5599> Timothy<WG5095>, guard<WG5442> that which is committed unto thee<WG3872>, turning<WG1624> away from the profane<WG952> babblings<WG2757> and<WG2532> oppositions<WG477> of the knowledge<WG1108> which is falsely so called<WG5581>;
which <WG3739> some<WG5100> professing<WG1861> have erred<WG795> concerning<WG4012> the faith<WG4102>. Grace<WG5485> be with<WG3326> you<WG4675>. Amen<WG281>.
